item.title: Books 2019
item.description: One of my new years resolutions was to try and read 10 books this year. That may not sound a lot, but when you have a myriad of other things going on in your life, that’s a tall order. This is what I’ve managed to read. Books Dark Sacred Night Michael Connelly I’m a massive Connelly fan, I’ve read and kept all the Bosch novels he’s ever written. I’m not a hoarder at all, but this is the only series of books I’ve kept.
